description:
Javascript MIDI Music Pattern Generator


Music Pattern Generator v2.2 is a music app. Use it online at https://www.hisschemoller.com/mpg. Alternatively, desktop versions for Linux, Mac and Windows are available for download below. The new feature in v2.2 is the Snapshots functionality that lets you change many parameters at once. This app is the new version of my old Euclidean Pattern Generator that only existed as a Java app.
